dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform float factor = 0.5;&#000a;vec2 onePixel = vec2(factor / 480.0, factor / 320.0);&#000a;vec2 texCoord = UV;&#000a;vec4 col;&#000a;col.rgb = vec3(0.5);&#000a;col -= tex(TEXTURE, texCoord - onePixel) * 3.0;&#000a;col += tex(TEXTURE, texCoord + onePixel) * 3.0;&#000a;col.rgb = vec3((col.r + col.g + col.b) / 3.0);&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * vec4(col.rgb, 1);"
